about_the_game:
Get equipped with the stunningly nostalgic Mega Man X6 Sound Collection, featuring the rockin' tunes from the original Mega Man X6!

The 44-minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Includes three high quality formats: MP3 (V0 bitrate), 16-bit FLAC and AAC. (Download size: 107MB for MP3, 312MB for FLAC and 143MB for AAC)
